alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 9:52PM CDT until September 23 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles north of Raiford, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Crowder... Canadian... Indianola... Hanna... Stidham... Arrowhead State Park... Raiford... Vivian... Vernon... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 246 and 249. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
